text: Paweł Pawłowski is a basketball player from Poland. Pawłowski competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Pawel PAWLOWSKI He was born on 3 March 1982.Paweł Pawłowski == References == Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Olympians for Poland Category:Polish basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Gdańsk
title: Paweł Pawłowski
